"A Modern Mural Masterpiece"
Details
Action
 Place A Modern Mural Masterpiece
Build Cost
 -25000
Limits
 Needs a consultant upgrade: Large Art Works, Valid placement: above ground floor, on ground floor, Cannot be placed on glass, Art Gallery: need at least 1, Lobby Mural: must not have any
Width

Height
 1
Commission and place a large lobby mural by a famous artist for a significant prestige boost. It will also generate buzz and influence as well as attract curious visitors.

Build Cost
 -2000
Limits

An art dealer will grant your building some prestige and will attract a few art-loving visitors to your building. You must build an art dealer in order to unlock medium artworks

A famous art gallery in your building is quite presitious and will attract a good number of visiting art patrons. You must build an art gallery in order to unlock large artworks
